author: perezhilton
title: Sean Spicer's Venmo Account Is Public & Now The Internet Is Trolling Him For Money!!
text:
We can't make this stuff up!
As if Melisa McCarthy 's SNL impersonation of Sean Spicer wasn't funny enough, it turns out the White House Press Secretary's Venmo account is actually public!
So as of now, anyone can pay or charge him money ‚Äî but mostly everyone's been charging him. LOLz!
Related: Trump Claims The Press Isn't Reporting Terrorist Attacks!
You can believe Twitter is having the most fun with it as users have been uploading screenshots of their charges. From medical bills to cinnamon gum, these requests are too good!
Ch-ch-check them all out (below):
sean spicer has a venmo account. one of my facebook friends just sent him a venmo request for $50K for cinnamon gum. LMFAO
‚Äî Dillon Forrest (@dillonforrest) February 7, 2017
PSA Sean Spicer's venmo account is unprotected pic.twitter.com/2BR3fQziDc
‚Äî smash (@running4acheck) February 7, 2017
Sean Spicer is on Venmo #TheMoreYouKnow pic.twitter.com/yyZrrBDJLb
‚Äî Jamie (@jlew8) February 7, 2017
Hey everyone, let's send @seanspicer a message, courtesy of venmo! (His handle is @seanspicer ) #VetsVsHate pic.twitter.com/O9kvBI5dvz
‚Äî Alexander McCoy (@AlexanderMcCoy4) February 7, 2017
" @seanspicer declined your request for $200 - Therapy. ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è" Bummer. cc @venmo pic.twitter.com/0LdQjnBGSV
‚Äî Katie Campisano (@katiecamp5) February 7, 2017
Just in case the Venmo notification didn't go through, @seanspicer pic.twitter.com/bNEfhfPfZW
‚Äî Brigid (@Ice_Brig) February 7, 2017
We have a feeling Spicer is going to be declining a whole lot of charges after this!
But hey, we're sure he has the time!
[ Image via Media Punch . ]
